title: Overflowing Garbage on Road 21
description: Garbage has not been collected for 5 days and is starting to smell, causing issues for local residents.

title: Deep Pothole on Main Street
description: A large and dangerous pothole has formed near the intersection, posing a risk to vehicles.

title: Broken Streetlight on Park Ave
description: The streetlight at the corner has been out for over a week, making the area very dark and unsafe at night.

title: Unfinished Sidewalk Construction
description: Construction crew left a sidewalk project unfinished, with rebar and debris creating a hazard.

title: Illegal Dumping in Alleyway
description: Someone has illegally dumped construction waste and old furniture in the alley behind the market.

title: Cracked Park Bench
description: A wooden bench in the central park is cracked and could be dangerous for people to sit on.
